title: More imports causes more financial capital inflow

content.question: If consumers in Canada increase their demand for products that are manufactured in India, which of the following will occur?

choices.label: India’s financial capital inflow will increase.
Canada’s financial capital inflow will increase.
The supply of Canadian dollars will decrease.

content.answer: Canada’s financial capital inflow will increase.

unit.text: 6: Open Economy - International Trade and Finance

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Determine the effect(s) of one or more changes on other economic markets.
